reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan soft, cozy, and well-made, with a shade of blue they describe as "to die for.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: Love this sweater in camel/white. It’s a boxy fit, but it’s really super cute. Very comfortable and soft. It has a light thickness to it. It’s not too heavy, but it’s also not extremely light. The pockets on the front are kind of nice to have. Read more
items.author: Anonymous

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality style and comfort
items.body: Love pretty garden and I’ve bought several items from them. Love the color snd details. Soft buttery material not itchy. Warm but not stifling hot good quality for the price point. Can be dressed up or down. Looks great with trousers or shirts. Or relaxed with jeans Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: Super cute. True to size but I do think it’s shorter and wide. I got a large and I’m 5’7- 150 Read more
items.author: Stephanie Oechsle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, Soft Sweater – Wear Tied for Best Look
items.body: So cute and soft—love this chunky cardigan as a stylish sweater for fall and winter! Works beautifully over dresses or with pants. Best worn tied in the front, since leaving it open makes the ties dangle awkwardly. Cozy fit, trendy puff sleeves, and a great layering piece for cooler weather. Read more
items.author: Taylor

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get it!
items.body: So soft and cozy! I loved the front bows, super cute! Great with any outfit! Read more
items.author: Ann

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Quality is not a 10!
items.body: Super Cute, beautiful color, spot on packing and delivery. The quality, however, was not so great. As soon as I received it, I put it in the dryer to "fluff". The sweater now looks fuzzy, like I've had it several years....darn! Read more
items.author: Donna J. Estrada

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Pretty Garden winner
items.body: This is a lovely cardigan with unique closing. Very soft and luxurious. I returned because the sizing is hugh. Recommend that you size down and note that the bottum hem is not tapered. Read more
items.author: Nancy Henderson

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible pilling after one wear
items.body: One star sounds pretty awful, right? Well based on my experience with this sweater, it’s entirely accurate. First of all, I didn’t like the style, and I really thought it was too big. I intended to send it back unworn, but as it often happens, I missed the return date. As such, I decided to make the best of it and removed the “ties” so I could just wear it as a regular cardigan. Untied it just looked like an oversized, comfy cardigan rather than a too big sweater which is how it looked on me with the tie closures. Having removed the ties, I slipped it over a white top one chilly afternoon and wore it to a lunch date and then did some shopping. The sweater is really heavy but also quite soft. I thought to myself that I had definitely made the best of an unfortunate situation and patted myself on the back at the end of the day. At the end of the day, I hung it up in the closet where it remained until today. Faced with another chilly day, I grabbed it out of the closet and carried it downstairs and tossed it on the counter while I prepared yo leave the house. When I went to retrieve it, it was laying with the underside of the sleeve facing up. And that’s when I noticed the reason this sweater is getting one star - horrible pilling after only one wearing!!! I’d be aggravated if a sweater looked like this after four or five wearings, but after only one?!!!! This is ridiculous!!!! It looks awful!! I can only imagine what it will look like after a couple more wearings. I understand that a $42 sweater should not be considered high end by any means, but it’s still a complete waste of money. I will avoid this brand in the future. Read more
items.author: K. Joe

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Camel White, Sky Blue, Wine Red White, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Camel, Black White, Brick Red, Mist Blue, Dark Green, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
